# Resource `aquasec_permissions_sets`

The `aquasec_permissions_sets` resource manages your Permission Set within Aqua.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **actions** (List of String)
- **name** (String)
- **ui_access** (Boolean)

### Optional

- **author** (String)
- **description** (String)

- **updated_at** (String)
